alert.note: Alert for McKenzie; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 7:18PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MCKENZIE AND SOUTHWESTERN WILLIAMS COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/... At 716 PM CDT/616 PM MDT/, Thunderstorm were clustered around an area located 6 miles south of Bonetrail, or 16 miles northwest of Williston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These strong thunderstorms will be near... Bonetrail around 720 PM CDT. Williston around 740 PM CDT. Epping around 800 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lewis And Clark State Park, Fort Buford State Historical Site, Trenton, Spring Brook, Blacktail Lake and Wheelock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
